duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide excellent customer service by assisting customers with their needs, answering inquiries, and resolving complaints.
Engage with customers in a friendly manner while completing transactions on the cash register.
Maintain the cleanliness and organization of the store.
Stock store shelves with merchandise and ensure proper identification is produced when selling age-restricted items.
Assist with the operation of the Photo department, if applicable.
Build and maintain displays of merchandise and complete new plan-o-grams.
Complete inventory counts and order merchandise based on the results.
Assist with price markdowns and changes for merchandise on the shelves.
Put up signs that identify items on sale in weekly advertisements and take down this signage when the sale is over.
